Reduce - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log
The Reducer class for the IBM1 MapReduce job Assumes that probabilities are in the log probability space
Reduce() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log.Reduce
 
reduce(Text, Iterable<Pair>, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log.Reduce
reduce function in the IBM1 MapReduce job It takes source language words as a key and a Pair containing the target language word and a double It finishes the Expectation step by combining values dependent on the source language word and then computes the Maximization step of the EM algorithm Then proceeds to execute the Maximization Step of the EM algorithm It outputs the source word and target word as a key ("e|f") and double which is the probability of "f" being translated into "e" for more details see my project report
Reduce - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.normal
The Reducer class for the IBM1 MapReduce job
Reduce() - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.normal.Reduce
 
reduce(Text, Iterable<Pair>, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.normal.Reduce
reduce function in the IBM1 MapReduce job It takes source language words as a key and a Pair containing the target language word and a double It finishes the Expectation step by combining values dependent on the source language word and then computes the Maximization step of the EM algorithm Then proceeds to execute the Maximization Step of the EM algorithm It outputs the source word and target word as a key ("e|f") and double which is the probability of "f" being translated into "e" for more details see my project report
RunWordAlignment(Configure, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper.Main
Function that starts the word alignment computations with the configuration specified
